archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.8: Malware protection software should be supported by anti-exploitation features on endpoint devices and software (e.g. Microsoft Data Execution Prevention (DEP), Windows Defender Exploit Guard (WDEG), Apple System Integrity Protection (SIP) or Apple Gatekeeper).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
